name: Quaranteed
description:
This game is about surviving until you are saved. Meanwhile, you have to go to an abandoned shopping mall and look for something to eat. The game has become very difficult in my opinion so be warned.

Got the sounds  from:

fesliyanstudios.com

zapsplat.com

Freetousesounds.com

They are all free to use and i reccommend to check them out.
